name: The Deal (itch)
description:
The Deal!
Made in 72 hours for GamesPlusJam with the theme of TIME

Mr.Bojangles time is running out, he lays dying in his old creaky mansion, as the clock of life ticks away something changes and the devil appears offering him a second chance at youth! The Devil gives Mr.Bojangles the Elixir of life which turns out to be a giant gun! but there is a catch. . . every bullet shot from this weapon reduces the users life span unless he takes the life of another living creature. . .

Survive as long as you can through 3 waves of the devils spawn, every shot you take that doesn't kill an enemy will reduce your life span & age your appearance, but almost every enemy you kill will reward you with different levels of youth or even more age!! 

Enemy's vary in color, each taking a certain amount of shots to kill, the more shots it takes the better the reward, but remember whether you kill the enemy or not every bullet shot from the Elixir of life gun will age it's user, so you better make sure your shots count!

Move around with W.A.S.D
Use the MOUSE to aim & Left Click to shoot
Tap P on the keyboard to mute the background music

Music made by Paul Propp

Enemy types.
+++++++++++
Purple - adds 10 to age
Blue - subtracts 15 from age
Green - subtracts 20 from age
Gold -  subtracts 25 from age
